item.title: Build Docker Images Faster with Data Science Packages
item.description: If you want to install data science packages like numpy, scipy, pandas etc with docker, it will take forever to build the images if you are using pip. Because pip compiles the C extended code and it takes a long time. For numpy it took me around 4 minutes and scipy, I do not know, I stopped the build.
